fields.label: Tip
fields.description: Opcionalni medij da se prikaže iznad pitanja.

fields.label: Tekst savjeta
fields.description: Savjet korisniku. Ovo će se pojaviti prije nego što korisnik provjeri odgovor(e).

fields.label: Poruka se prikazuje ako je odgovor označen
fields.description: Poruka će se pojaviti ispod odgovora "provjeri" ako je odgovor označen.

fields.label: Poruka se prikazuje ako odgovor nije označen
fields.description: Poruka će se pojaviti ispod odgovora "provjeri" ako je odgovor označen.

fields.label: Definiraj uobičajeni feedbak za bilo koji raspon rezultata
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
Option should not have been checked
Tekst za "Zahtjeva odgovor" poruku
fields.default: Molimo vas da odgovorite prije nego što vidite rješenje.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
fields.default: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

semantics.label: Postavke ponašanje
semantics.description: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: Vrsta pitanja
fields.description: Select the look and behaviour of the question.

fields.label: Daje jedan poen za cijeli zadatak
fields.description: Enable to give a total of one point for multiple correct answers. This will not be an option in "Single answer" mode.

fields.label: Izmješaj odgovore
fields.description: Enable to randomize the order of the answers on display.

fields.label: zahtjeva odgovor prije nego što se rješenje može vidjeti.
Automatski provjeri odgovore
fields.description: Enabling this option will make accessibility suffer, make sure you know what you're doing.

fields.label: Procenat za prolaz
fields.description: This setting often won't have any effect. It is the percentage of the total score required for getting 1 point when one point for the entire task is enabled, and for getting result.success in xAPI statements.

fields.label: Prikaži broj poena
fields.description: Show points earned for each answer. This will not be an option in 'Single answer' mode or if 'Give one point for the whole task' option is enabled.

fields.label: Body text
fields.default: Jeste li sigurni da želite završiti?

fields.label: Glavni tekst
fields.default: Jeste li sigurni da želite ponoviti?
